title.narrative: Association for Struggle Against Sexual Violence (CSMD)
Föreningen för Kamp mot Sexuellt Våld (CSMD)

description.narrative:
Association for Struggle Against Sexual Violence (CSMD) har ansökt om finansiering på 12 500 000 SEK hos Sida för sin strategiska plan under perioden 2021-2023.
Insatsen syftar till att minska sexuellt och sexualiserat våld och dess effekter genom att 1) stärka och stödja överlevare av sexuellt våld 2) transformation av sociala uppfattingar och förebyggande av sexuellt våld innan det utövas och 3) säkra den finansiella och organisatoriska hållbarheten av CSMD
Stödet från Sida (12 500 000 SEK) kommer att utgöra nästan 80% av deras budget för 2021 och organisationen har ännu inte säkrat någon annan finansiering efter 2021.

Association for Struggle Against Sexual Violence (CSMD) has applied to Sida for funding of 12 500 000 SEK for their Strategic Plan during the period 2021-2023.
The intervention aims at reduction of sexual and sexualised violence and its effects by 1) providing empowerment & support to the survivors of sexual violence, 2) transformation of social perceptions & prevention of sexual violence before it occurs and 3) ensuring the sustainability of financial and organizational structure of CSMD.
The amount of support to be provided by Sida (12 500 000 SEK) will constitute almost 80% of their budget for 2021 and the organisation has not yet secured any other funding beyond 2021.

IMPACT: REDUCTION OF SEXUAL AND SEXUALIZED VIOLENCE AND ITS EFFECTS OBJECTIVE 1: EMPOWERMENT & SUPPORT Outcome 1: The survivors of sexual violence enjoy their rights more and have more access to support and services. OBJECTIVE 2: TRANSFORMATION & PREVENTION Outcome 1: Increased preventive and protective studies for the prevention of sexual violence before it occurs Outcome 2: Increased transformation of social perceptions and practices that lead to sexual/ized violence OBJECTIVE 3: ORGANIZATIONAL SUSTAINABILITY Outcome 1: Ensuring the sustainability of financial and organizational structure of the Association Outcome 2: Increased organizational capacity of the Association on institutional communication, team capacity building, advocacy and networking

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls

tag.narrative: 5.2 - Avskaffa alla former av våld mot alla kvinnor och flickor i det offentliga och privata rummet, inklusive människohandel, sexuellt utnyttjande och andra typer av exploatering.
5.2 - Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation.
